title: Export file in RhinoCommon (not via command line)
question:
Hi there,

I have not found anything in RhinoCommon about exporting items.

So far I use the command line, but it is a bit bulky (like the import as well).

Is there an option in RhinoCommon to export items (to 3dm, step, dxf, â€¦)?


Thanks in advance,

T.

code_blocks.code:
import Rhino

doc = Rhino.RhinoDoc.ActiveDoc 

doc.Import( r'path')  #you can also define import options as ArchivableDictionary class

doc.Export( r'path' , options)
code_blocks.author: Mo_Ghattas
